scripts.check:contracts: bash -c 'changed=$(git diff --name-only --cached); [ -z "$changed" ] && changed=$(git diff --name-only HEAD); if echo "$changed" | grep -E "^gateway/src/schema/" >/dev/null; then echo "$changed" | grep -E "^docs/20_contracts.md$" >/dev/null || { echo "Error: gateway/src/schema changed but docs/20_contracts.md not updated in this commit/stage."; exit 1; }; fi; echo Contracts check passed'
